text: Constable Tim Fanning says Eric Allen Kirkpatrick, who had recently been fired from his job in Vancouver, is accused of fatally shooting Benjamin David Banky. Fanning says at least a dozen people were at the party when the gunman entered about 4 p.m. Police locked down the neighborhood and Kirkpatrick gave up about two hours later. The business at the location of the shooting is listed as TallGrass Distribution, a natural health product supplier.
title: A 61-year-old man in Canada is charged with first-degree murder in a deadly office Christmas party shooting.
